subject_information.comments: The other player seemed to stop playing after round 7: I got no action from him though I restated the direction four different ways. I was just about to return the hit when this screen appeared.
subject_information.strategy: I tried to use simple commands. If there was an error I would try to be *more explicit*, since I assumed there were multiple objects of the same kind, some of which I could not see. At one time, I said to use the 'other' item, and that worked.
